document_data.mainbody:
ully was a thug from the criminal underbelly of Waterdeep circa 1490s DR.
Sully was not afraid in getting his hands dirty and could go against the City Watch for a right price or in exchange for a right favor.
Sully had many connections within Waterdeeps crime organizations as well as more dangerous affiliations with the tomb-robbers in Neverwinter.
Sometime in the 1490s DR, before the case of Laeral Silverhands stolen baby griffon, Sully was acquainted with the halfling thief that later was recruited against his will to aid the Open Lords stolen pets retrieval. If the halfling thief were to fail his mission and flee Waterdeep, Sully was ready to lend him a hand in exchange for the little rogues help with robbing a certain dwarven tomb just outside of Neverwinter.
